title.narrative: CM-Community Development Program Support Project Phase-II

description.narrative: The Project Development Objective is to improve delivery of priority basic services (in targeted communes, and extend the ongoing process of decentralization to new regions. The main beneficiaries will be the communes and communities supported during PNDP I (155) plus 167 non covered communes, in which 110 in the five new regions.

condition.narrative: Mid-term Review no later than 30 months after the Effective Date
Recruitment of an auditor for the Project, not later than 6 months after the Effective Date
Recruitment of external auditor no later than 4 months after the Effective Date
The Recipient shall carry out the Project in accordance with the Project Implementation Manual, the Monitoring and EvaluationManual and the Financial Managenent Manual.
The Recipient shall cause the Project to be implemented in accordance with the environmental, social and resettlement guidelines,rules and procedures, defined in the ESMF and the and the IPDF.
The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the Project and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provisionsof Section 4.08 of the General Conditions.
The Recipient shall perform on a yearly basis, random technical and financial audits of CDP-Sub-projects in Participating Communeson a yearly basis or as otherwise agreed with the Association.
The audited Financial Statements for each such period shall be furnished to the Association not later than six months after theendof such period.
Upgrade the integrated financial management software to be used by the Project, by no later than 3 months after the Effective Date
